Package com.lloseng.ocsf.client

Class ObservableClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.lloseng.ocsf.client.ObservableClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObservableSWRClient

    public class ObservableClient
extends java.util.Observable
    This class acts as a subclass of AbstractClient and is also an Observable class. Each time a new message is received, observers are notified.
    Version:
    Febuary 2001
    Author:
    Dr Robert Laganière, Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, François Bélange
